flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Old Fedex boxes (3), wrapping paper, white printer paper
Tools
  • Scissors, Glue, Scotch Tape

parts.text: Old Fedex boxes (3), wrapping paper, white printer paper

guide.summary: This tutorial walks you through the steps involved in making a small filer or organizer made with recycled Fedex boxes, convenient enough to put on a table, or a corner of your house. Use it to store documents, kid’s books or even reports and files.
guide.title: Recycled Cardboard Organizer
